com.vernalis.pdbconnector.config
Class ReportField

java.lang.Object
  com.vernalis.pdbconnector.config.ReportField

public class ReportField
extends java.lang.Object

ReportField class. A ReportField represents a single report column, and defines:

  • UI label
  • String to use in report request
  • Report table column type
  • Report table column name (default is same as UI label)
  • Default status (selected or unselected)
  • Triggers (other report fields, report categories, or standard reports that will trigger the selection of this field)

See Also:
ReportCategory, StandardReport

isTriggered

public boolean isTriggered(ReportField field)
Checks if is triggered by another ReportField. Returns true if the other ReportField (or the parent category of the other ReportField) is in the trigger list for this field.

Parameters:
field - the field
Returns:
true, if is triggered

isTriggered

public boolean isTriggered(StandardReport report)

Returns:
true, if is triggered
